member.name: TOKEN_PRIVILEGES
member.summary: The TOKEN_PRIVILEGES structure contains information about a set of privileges for an access token.

member.name: TOKEN_PRIVILEGES.PrivilegeCount
member.summary: This must be set to the number of entries in the Privileges array.

member.name: TOKEN_PRIVILEGES.Privileges
member.summary:
Specifies an array of structures. Each structure contains the and attributes of a privilege. To get the name of the privilege associated with a LUID, call the function, passing the address of the LUID as the value of the lpLuid parameter.
Important The constant ANYSIZE_ARRAY is defined as 1 in the public header Winnt.h. To create this array with more than one element, you must allocate sufficient memory for the structure to take into account additional elements.The attributes of a privilege can be a combination of the following values. ValueMeaningSE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLEDThe privilege is enabled.SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULTThe privilege is enabled by default.SE_PRIVILEGE_REMOVEDUsed to remove a privilege. For details, see .SE_PRIVILEGE_USED_FOR_ACCESSThe privilege was used to gain access to an object or service. This flag is used to identify the relevant privileges in a set passed by a client application that may contain unnecessary privileges.
